_sText:
=======================================================
de_altepa: a Counter-Strike: Source Experience by DocRock
=======================================================
Map Name:                       	de_altepa.bsp
Filesize:                       	6.2 mb
Author:                         	DocRock
Author email:                   	docrock10@cox.net
Homepage:		http://docrocksmaps.homestead.com/docmaps.html                    
=======================================================
LEVEL DESCRIPTION:

Single Player:                 	No
Co-Op:                         	No
Deathmatch:                     	No
Suggested Players:             	12 per team or more


Map description:                	Terrorists are trying to blow up an ancient egyptian monolith
			that has been unearthed in a desert dig.															
=======================================================
CONSTRUCTION:

base map:                       		dm_altepa (for HL2dm) & depotarena (for HL1)
prefabs:                        		None
editor used:                    	 	Source SDK
utilities used:                 		None	
known bugs:                     		None
compile machine:                		Intel Pentium 4   2.53 GHZ
compile time:                   		20 minutes

=======================================================
INSTALLATION:


Run Winzip and unzip de_altepa.rar to your Counter-Strike: Source maps folder.

=======================================================

=======================================================
SPECIAL THANKS:

babykitkat -
My sweet love, this map is for you, as are all of my maps.  You saved my life, 
and now make my life happier and happier by the day.  Thank you bebe for everything.
I love you.

Silly -
Thanks for all the help on this map.  Your insight and inspiration to make a CSS map has made
me into a hardcore CSS player.  Thanks for everything!

Other thanks
for their input and advice
